channel.title: Thief 4 Status Update
channel.description:
Seems to be a lot of senior staff departures away from the Thief 4 development team. A no-show at the recent E3 and a trailer completed some time ago that's never been shown.
[url='https://kotaku.com/5918203/thief-4-is-that-you']https://kotaku.com/5918203/thief-4-is-that-you[/url]
I'm sure it'll be released eventually, but when and how good it will be is up in the air for now.

item.title: Thief 4 Status Update
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
Yeah, i doubt something made now officially would compare to some of the best Thief FMs, which I have yet to play.

Plus the Dark mod technically can take the place as a “next-gen” thief game since it’s so well done and faithful to the original

They’d probably fuck it up anyway, by forcing third person on players or something

Read full topic

item.title: Thief 4 Status Update
item.dc:creator: gibbelin
item.description:
I’m not going to give them too much grief for that underwhelming trailer because it was clearly not released for a reason, and that reason could be that it’s still WIP (alleged “leak” to the contrary aside) or it wasn’t up to standards.

But as was said, Dishonored is going to be better than whatever Eidos releases anyway, so no harm, no foul if it sucks.

I still have the first two games and ten billion awesome fan missions.

Read full topic

item.title: Thief 4 Status Update
item.dc:creator: Oktober
item.description:
Thanks for the link Dadster. I was hoping to actually see something about Thief 4 during this year’s E3, but nothing. Really really do hope we’ll end up getting something official soon, i loved the Thief series when i played it years ago

Read full topic

item.title: Thief 4 Status Update
item.dc:creator: Dadster
item.description:
Bloodshot:

True, I retract previous fuck

Is that a form of coitus interruptus?

Just found this 30-second leaked trailer for Thief 4. Go see it NOW before it gets yanked.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jf-LG5lKK5E&feature=youtu.be

Read full topic
